The resulting part will be a long, thin, rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, where the width and length are both 0.75 units and the height is 0.0123 units. This is the base part for subsequent parts to be built upon. The points and lines described in the sketch may change based on the exact $sketch parameter. The above instructions should be a starting point for the junior CAD designer to generate an accurate CAD model, and they should refer to the $sketch parameter for any necessary adjustments.</description>

A cylindrical hole is located on one of the prism's faces. The cylindrical hole has a diameter approximately half of the prism's width. The cylindrical hole's height is 0.1269. The hole is centered on the prism face (considering the center of the prism's face as the origin).</description>
